sections.PURPOSE:
– SUAS (Puma) will observe round impact and pull grids for call for fire
Risk Mitigation: SUAS will never enter the impact area. Will fill outside impact area and firing positions. SUAS Flight Hours (as available from Range Bulletin):
0900-1700, 2000-2200
Take off/landing location
Alternate Take off/landing location
Impact Area
General Flight Path
Puma supplied and operated by 1/2CR Scouts.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Individual
071-11C-1000 – Fire a Mortar
091-91S-1053 – Maintain the 120mm Mortar on the Stryker Vehicle
071-11C-100 – Maintain the M67 Sight Unit
Platoon
07-PLT-5072 – Operate a Mortar Fire Direction Center
07-PLT-5090 – Process a Mortar Call for Fire
sections.EXECUTION: Begins with Platoon staged and MFP 161A and ends with completion of all day and night Fire
